name: Puzzle Bobble 2
description:
It's simple. Bust the multi-colored balls before they bust you!

Puzzle Bobble 2 is the lightning-quick, ultra-intense, 100% addictive, arcade puzzler that's gonna grab you and never let go! As the balls descend, you're gonna need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to match 3 or more balls and pop them...fast! Insane two-player action pits you against an opponent in a race to bust or be busted!!

Match 'em by color! Stack 'em! Pop 'em! It's the end all, be all, puzzle game of the century that lets everyone BUST-A-MOVE!!!
